page.title: 07Possessions 1 Shobdon/Byton
page.content: { We asked 78 people to select,}from a list of 62 items,{their possessions. 78 homes had a radio 76 homes had a vacuum cleaner 73 homes had an electric kettle 72 homes had an electric iron 71 homes had a camera 71 homes had a telephone 70 homes had a refrigerator 69 homes had an electric cooker 68 homes had a colour television 66 homes had a car or van 66 homes had a hair drier 63 homes had a powered lawn-mower 62 homes had a cassette recorder 56 homes had a freezer 53 homes had an electric toaster 53 homes had an electric blanket 52 homes had a sewing machine 51 homes had a food mixer 50 homes had an electric drill{ 50 homes had a record player
